name: Malam Roh
set-up: spirits_eve/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Halloween/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Maru true 0 2 2 0 0 3 -11 0 0 -7 5 0 0 2 4 0/advancedMove Alex true -4 0 4 4000 4 0 4 5000/advancedMove Jas true 1 1500 4 1000/advancedMove Pam true 0 1 1 5000 0 -1 1 5000/advancedMove Shane true -7 0 0 2 2 9000 0 -2 7 0 4 9000/advancedMove Demetrius true 3 18000 4 3000/addTemporaryActor Skeleton 16 32 30 59 2 false Monster/advancedMove Skeleton true 0 1 3 4000 2 0 0 -1 4 2000 -1 0 3 1000 2 2000 0 -1 4 4000 -1 0 0 1 2 5000/addTemporaryActor Skeleton 16 32 35 58 2 false Monster/playerControl halloween
Abigail_spouse: Kau harus beritahu aku apa yang ada di dalam sana, Aku tidak bisa kesana... laba-laba...$s
Leah_spouse: Aku mungkin kebanyakan minum ale labu...
Maru_spouse: Aku bingung... pergilah duluan, aku mau memecahkan teka-teki ini dulu.
Penny_spouse: Oh... asapnya... Hmmm... Kamu tampak menawan malam ini.$l
Haley_spouse: Aku gampang takut... Kayaknya aku disini saja.$s
Sebastian_spouse: Pasti seru kalau ada permainan seperti ini di kebun.
Sam_spouse: Hei, Aku daritadi menunggumu kamu datang!$h
Harvey_spouse: Hai... sudah kuduga kamu akan menemukanku disini...$l
Elliott_spouse: Mmph... Sepertinya aku kebanyakan makan pai labu.
Robin: Hmm, sebentar lagi musim dingin. Itu waktu yang bagus untuk mengumpulkan kayu dan batu.
Demetrius: Dari tadi aku belum melihat Maru... Semoga dia baik-baik saja.
Maru: Kayaknya tadi aku sudah lewat sini... eh, tunggu...$s#$e#Aku tersesat...$s
Sebastian: Aku tidak mengerti bagaimana tengkorak itu bisa bergerak... seram.#$e#Tapi menarik sih.
Caroline: Aku penakut. Jadi kuserahkan labirinnya pada anak-anak muda.
Alex: Ada sesuatu yang aneh disana. Tapi bagaimana aku bisa kesana?#$e#Pasti ada jalur rahasia di sekitar sini.
George: Hmm... ada kalkun panggang? Festival ini tidak buruk juga.$h
Evelyn: Semoga Gus menambah hidangan vegetarian juga. Sate zucchini, mungkin?
Lewis: Selamat malam, @. Apa kamu sudah masuk ke labirin berhantu? Disana lumayan seram.#$e#Orang aneh yang tinggal di menara hutan yang menatanya. Dia tidak membolehkan siapapun mendekat saat dia sedang menyiapkan semuanya.
Clint: Salah satu gada iridiumku akan sangat berguna di tempat ini.
Emily: Apa kamu suka jack-o-lanterns? Aku yang membuat semuanya.
Penny: Asap-asap ini... mempuat kepalaku pusing, tapi aku tidak bisa pergi...$u
Pam: Aku akan datang ke festival apa saja asal ada makanan gratis! Tapi kamu takkan menemukanku di labirin.
Jodi: Vincent marah saat aku melarangnya masuk ke labirin... tapi dia hanya anak kecil!
Sam: Aneh... Di depan jalan buntu.#$e#Aku yakin tadi ada orang di depanku yang menembus labirin. Kemana perginya?
Leah: Mm, hai. Maaf... mulutku penuh blackberry.
Marnie: Hai, @. Apa musim gugurmu produktif?#$e#Cuacanya sudah mulai mendingin... Tananman tidak tahan dengan cuaca dingin.
Elliott: Oh, hai @. Sudah mulai dingin, ya?
Gus: Aku senang memasak labu. Kabu itu buah yang menarik.
Dwarf: Di permukaan sedang hujan katamu? *hahh*#$e#Hujan... Itu hal mistis bagi kami. Banyak dari kami yang tidak pernah melihat hujan di hidupnya.
Wizard: Aku kurang peduli dengan urusan orang biasa, tapi para Elemental ingin mengawasimu lebih dekat.#$e#Merekalah yang menyuruhku membuat labirin aneh ini.
Harvey: Oh! Kau menemukanku...$8#$b#Jujur, aku ketakutan dan kesini untuk sembunyi. Jangan bilang siapa-siapa.$s
Shane: Kenapa tidak ada ale labu lagi?
Sandy: Aku dengar sedang hujan di rumah. Apa karena itu kamu datang kesini?$h#$e#Aku jadi merindukan hujan...$s
Jas: Tapi bibi Marnie! Aku ingin masuk ke labirin! Aku tidak takut!$s
Vincent: Ibu tidak mengizinkanku masuk ke labirin. *hiks*$s
Leo: %Leo menatap layar bagai terhipnotis. Kamu tidak bisa mengalihkan perhatiannya.
set-up_y2: spirits_eve/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Halloween2/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Pam true 1 10000 4 2500/advancedMove Jodi true 4 12300 3 3000/advancedMove Harvey true 3 9000 4 2000 3 500 2 2500/advancedMove Vincent true 2 11000 3 1250 2 500 1 1000/advancedMove Sebastian true 2 13500 3 1400 2 500 1 1200/advancedMove Willy true 4 12000 3 1550 4 10500 1 1750/advancedMove Emily true 2 6500 3 1000 2 4000 1 1250/advancedMove Leah true 2 4000 1 3000 4 2250 1 500 2 800 0 5 -4 0 3 1100 2 3500 3 600 -4 0 0 -4 4 500 3 4000 2 1500 3 2500 4 1500 3 1750 2 500 0 4 4 0 1 800 2 3000 3 1500 2 3250 1 500 4 0 0 -5 4 2500/advancedMove Robin true 4 8500 2 0 1 500 4 6250 3 650 -2 0 3 400 4 500/advancedMove Abigail true 4 7500 1 500 2 0 1 400 4 5500 2 0 0 -3 4 500 3 6250 2 500 0 3 -2 0 3 500 4 3750 3 400 -2 0 3 500/advancedMove Alex true 2 8000 1 1000 2 650 3 1250 2 5500 1 1500 2 750 3 1500 2 500/advancedMove Kent true 4 3800 1 400 3 0 1 400 4 9600 3 500 -2 0 3 500 4 7000 3 400 -1 0 3 400/positionOffset Clint 16 -24/positionOffset Willy 5 -15/positionOffset George 0 -12/positionOffset Evelyn 0 -16/addTemporaryActor Mummy 16 32 9 62 2 false Monster/advancedMove Mummy true 2 5000 1 0 1 800 2 4000 3 2000 2 500 1 2500 2 4000 3 500 4 500 0 -1 4 1500 1 3000 2 4000 3 800 -1 0 3 1500 2 3750 0 1 2 2000/addTemporaryActor Wilderness_Golem 16 24 18 59 2 false Monster/advancedMove Wilderness_Golem true 2 5000 3 2500 2 4000 1 2000 2 1000 3 500 -1 0 3 1000 2 6000 0 1 2 4000 3 3000 2 500 1 2500 4 650 0 -1 -1 0 3 2000 3 5000 3 3000 2 2000 1 1500 2 0 1 3000/addTemporaryActor Stone_Golem 16 24 16 61 2 false Monster/advancedMove Stone_Golem true 2 3500 0 1 2 0 1 500 2 4000 1 800 4 500 0 -1 4 2000 1 2500 2 500 3 3000 -2 0 3 3000/advancedMove Leo true 2 5000 1 3000 2 3500 1 4000/addTemporaryActor Mummy 16 32 11 60 1 false Monster/playerControl halloween/viewport player clamp true unfreeze/globalFadeToClear
Abigail_spouse_y2: Have you ever fought any of these monsters before?$0#$e#Even... the s-spiders?$2
Leah_spouse_y2: I probably had too much pumpkin ale before jumping into the maze.$2#$e#You go on ahead. I'll catch up.$0
Maru_spouse_y2: Grab a plate and sit down with the family!$1
Penny_spouse_y2: *phew* I got lost in the maze...$3#$e#I was worried I might get trapped and everyone would go home without me!$12
Emily_spouse_y2: *giggle* I knew you'd find your way here.$0
Haley_spouse_y2: Hah! None of this is real.$h#$b#.... right, @? It's not real... right?$12
Alex_spouse_y2: Hey, you made it past the creepy hands.$1#$e#I think I hear someone calling for help nearby.$0
Sebastian_spouse_y2: Hey, could you... give me a hand? Hehehe...$h#$e#These gravestones would look nice on the farm, don't you think?$0
Sam_spouse_y2: My little brother and I made it pretty far in here but we got stuck.#$e#You go on ahead... find that treasure for us!
Harvey_spouse_y2: I was wondering when I'd see you.$1#$e#Don't mind me. I'm just taking a quick breather.$0
Elliott_spouse_y2: I shudder to think what would happen if these got loose...%noturn$2#$e#Fear not, my dear! I would run the cursed wretch through, before it could lay a finger on you.
Shane_spouse_y2: I talked Marnie into letting me take Jas into the maze. I think she's old enough.$0#$e#We're going very slow, though. Go ahead without us!$1
Abigail_y2: Did you see the decorations on our house? I don't like it...$2
Robin_y2: Are you looking forward to things slowing down soon? Winter is around the corner.$0
Demetrius_y2: Did you know... a study in the Journal of Anthropological Physiology found that the cadence, tempo, and key of music can have a measurable impact on cortisol levels?#$e#Er... Is there vanilla ice cream to go with the blackberry cobbler?$0
Maru_y2: After I finish this food, I'm going head-first into that maze!$0
Pierre_y2: Ah, it's farmer @! I have quite the selection of wares tonight. Take a look!$0
Caroline_y2: I should make a plate of food for my husband. He's been manning the shop all night.$0
Linus_y2: Haha! Another fine creation, my old friend.$1
Alex_y2: I think I heard a girl screaming... She needs my help!$0
George_y2: If I wasn't in this blasted chair, I'd be running circles around everyone in that maze!$0
Evelyn_y2: Dear, can you pass the zucchini fritters please?$0
Lewis_y2: Good evening, @. Once again, we've been graced with a haunted maze, constructed in secret by the eccentric who lives out in the forest.$0#$e#I've heard it's larger this year. Good luck if you dare to venture inside...
Clint_y2: I already made it through the maze... now it's time to kick back with a pumpkin ale!#$e#...I'm trying my best to ignore the spider infestation behind me.$0
Emily_y2: Ooooh. You found the secret entrance too!$1
Penny_y2: I was in the maze for a while but then I got hungry.$0#$e#My Mom seems to be enjoying herself.$0
Pam_y2: Pass another bottle of pumpkin ale over here!... *hic*$1
Haley_y2: Have you seen my sister?$2#$e#Emily! Can you hear me?$2
Jodi_y2: Sam took Vincent into the maze. I hope they're okay...$0
Kent_y2: These things don't look so tough.$0
Sam_y2: Am I Sam? Heh, heh, heh...$11
Leah_y2: Is it this way? Or maybe over here?$0
Marnie_y2: I hope Jas is okay in there.$2#$e#Did you have a successful year farming, @?
Elliott_y2: Oh pitiful wretch... in what fetid grotto lies your kingdom?%noturn$0#$e#Sometimes, one must stare into the abyss to stir a languid muse...
Gus_y2: Carving pumpkins is a talent of mine. I usually do most of the Jack-O-Lanterns for everyone in town.#$b#All I ask in return is to keep the seeds... sprinkle a little cinnamon sugar on those puppies and you've got yourself a golden snack!$h
Wizard_y2: The trials continue... Every magician must have an apprentice...
Harvey_y2: I'm afraid to say I'm quite puzzled on this one...$0
Shane_y2: You gotta stay close to me, Jas. Don't run off!%noturn$0
Sandy_y2: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Willy_y2: I'd watch yer back, lad... something terrible's in that maze...^I'd watch yer back, miss... something terrible's in that maze...
Vincent_y2: Did we beat the maze? Where's my prize?$0
Marlon_y2: I caught more monsters this year. Mind your distance near the cages.
Leo_y2: This is a maze inside of a maze... My head is spinning...$0
